name: ArenaPlatGunner
description:
A and D or Left and Right: Move.

Left Click : Shoot/Reload

Maintain Left Click: Slow time down

Right Click while maintaining Left Click: Cancel the shot

R: Restart

Space bar: Jump

You only have one bullet. The good news is that destroying an enemy grants you your ammunition back and you can fire again without reloading. Survive the longest :3
